Ian, can you take a look at this?  It appears to be caused by DTTagConverter.copyChildren.  When the method does the copy for the h:form, it hits the JSP comment at index 5.  It skips it, but continues to use the incremented 'i' which means an off-by-one gap is created in the ConvertPosition indexing.
Verified workaround: remove inline comments and file will load in VPD.
Fixed in HEAD and builds later than 2007/03/01.
